Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Chicago. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Chicago.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Sacramento
ShortDescription: WB 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie and 63rd due to street blockage near 63rd/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie and 63rd due to street blockage near 63rd/Sacramento.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
